step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Ensure your arm is stretched straight overhead and you feel that gentle resistance.
Excellent! Keep that arm extended overhead. Now, focus on opening your palm and fingers wide.
Great work opening your hand wide. Remember to inhale as you make a fist and tighten your muscles.
Nicely done! As you exhale, relax your muscles and open your hand. Visualize the fluid moving.
Good start on your second repetition. Keep that arm straight overhead and feel the stretch.
Excellent! Continue holding your arm overhead. Now, open your palm and fingers wide.
Great job opening your hand. Remember to inhale as you make a fist and engage your muscles.
Perfect! Exhale and relax your hand, visualizing the lymph flow. You're doing great!

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Focus on opening your hand wide and then making a fist while inhaling, followed by relaxing and opening your hand while exhaling.
